targets.query:
SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."V"
WHERE "entity_id" =~ /esp32_pv_bms_cell_voltage_(0[1-9]|1[0-6])$/
  AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"

SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."V"
WHERE "entity_id" =~ /esp32_pv_bms_cell_voltage_(0[1-9]|1[0-6])$/
  AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"

SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."V"
WHERE ("entity_id" = 'esp32_pv_bms_delta_cell_voltage')
  AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"

SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."%"
WHERE ("entity_id" = 'esp32_pv_bms_state_of_charge')
  AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"

SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."%"
WHERE ("entity_id" = 'esp32_pv_bms_state_of_charge')
  AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"

SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."V"
WHERE ("entity_id" = 'esp32_pv_bms_total_voltage')
  AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"

SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."Ω"
WHERE ("entity_id" =~ /esp32_pv_bms_cell_resistance_(\d{1,2})$/)
  AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"

SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."°C"
WHERE ("entity_id" =~ /esp32_pv_bms_temperature_sensor_(\d{1})$/) OR "entity_id"='esp32_pv_bms_power_tube_temperature'
  AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"

SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."%"
WHERE (
  "entity_id" = 'growat_esp_growatt_inverter_fan_speed' OR 
  "entity_id" = 'growat_esp_growatt_mppt_fan_speed'
)
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"

SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."%"
WHERE ("entity_id" = 'growat_esp_growatt_load_percentage')
  AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"

SELECT "value"
FROM "homeassistant"."autogen"."°C"
WHERE ("entity_id" =~ /growat_esp_growatt_buck_\d{1}_temperature/) 
  OR "entity_id" = 'growat_esp_growatt_dc_dc_temperature'
    OR "entity_id" = 'growat_esp_growatt_inverter_temperature'
    OR "entity_id" = 'growat_esp_growatt_pv_temperature'
  AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "entity_id"
